channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Supreme Court Chief Justice Roberts says rule of law is 'endangered'
item.description: Supreme Court Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. suggested Monday the rule of law is "endangered" during remarks in Washington.

item.title: Inflation was steady in April, meaning no sign of tariff shock yet

item.title: A Reader’s Guide to the Sam Tanenhaus Biography of William F. Buckley Jr.
item.description: This book is long, self-indulgently long. But in one sense it’s not nearly long enough.

item.title: Medicaid Is Junk Health Care
item.description: Will Republicans have the courage to expose that and improve it?

item.title: Dems Sworn To Oppose Trump Land Awkwardly On The Side Of Higher Drug Prices
item.description: Democrats don’t care enough about drug costs to collaborate. Any desire Democrats have to solve problems is dwarfed by their scorn for Trump.

item.title: U.S., Saudi Arabia sign economic partnership pact
item.description: President Trump and Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman signed a strategic economic partnership agreement in Riyadh on Tuesday.

item.title: The On-Again, Off-Again Trade War
item.description: Who knows what will happen in 90 days? The Soviet Union was governed by Five-Year Plans; now, we are governed by 90-Day Pauses.

item.title: Annual Report: Planned Parenthood Aborted More Babies Than Ever, Got More Taxpayer Cash Than Ever
item.description: More than 183 lawmakers across 49 states demanded the GOP Congress take action to ‘stop federal Medicaid dollars from going to Big Abortion.’

item.title: Nodule found in former President Biden's prostate during routine physical exam
item.description: A small nodule was found in the prostate of former President Joseph R. Biden during a routine physical exam, a spokesperson said Tuesday.

item.title: David Hogg slams 'fast-track' effort to oust him as DNC vice chair
item.description: The DNC Credentials Committee voted on Monday to elevate a vote challenging Vice Chairs David Hogg and Malcolm Kenyatta's leadership positions.

item.title: What You Need to Know About Trump and Crypto
